item.title: About me
item.description: Hello! I’m Marín Alcaraz. Right now, I work as a Full Stack Engineer for Wootric. I studied Computer Systems Engineering at the ITESM with a brief, but awesome stint at EPITECH. After, college I went to the Recurse Center and had the best time of my life building cool software projects, like a Dropbox clone or my own ad-blocker. I’m passionate about Infrastructure, Information Security, Ruby, and TypeScript. When I’m away from my keyboard you can find me singing, dancing Rueda de Casino, or riding my bike.
